definitions.definition: a piece of equipment made of a large piece of special cloth that is fastened to a person or thing that is dropped from an aircraft, in order to make him, her, or it fall slowly and safely to the ground
to jump from an aircraft using a parachute:
examples: The plan is to parachute into the town.

definitions.definition: to drop someone or something from an aircraft by parachute:
examples: [ often passive ] Thousands of leaflets were parachuted behind enemy lines.
